features: Audio Recording, Auto Power Save, Date/Time Stamp, Direct Print, PictBridge Support, cropping an image, digital noise reduction, display brightness control, in-camera red-eye removal
connectortypes: 1 x USB, 1 x composite video/audio output, 1 x docking station
shootingprograms: Backlight, Beach/snow, Close-up, Copy, Dawn/dusk, Fireworks, Landscape, Museum, Night landscape, Night portrait, Panorama assist, Party/indoor, Portrait mode, Sports mode, Sunset, Underwater
screendetails: LCD display - TFT active matrix - 2.5" - colour
flashmodes: Auto Mode, Fill-in mode, flash OFF mode, red-eye reduction, slow synchro
operatingsystemsupported: Apple MacOS X 10.1.5 or later, MS Windows 2000, MS Windows 98 SE, MS Windows ME, MS Windows XP
